description: An expensive military grade model of augmented reality glasses, comes with adaptive light and vision correction, additionally comes with light-amp/infrared vision modes and basic functionality of civilian grade AR glasses.  An augmented reality overlay allow the user to zoom, and it displays handy information about local topology.

use_action.msg: You flick the control dial to light amplification mode.
